
QUICK START GUIDE
=================

For experienced developers:
---------------------------

# Setup
mkdir naturalization-tracker && cd naturalization-tracker
mkdir -p src/components src/utils

# Copy all generated files to their locations (see DIRECTORY_STRUCTURE.txt)

# Install & run
npm install
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

Done! App runs at http://localhost:5173


For beginners:
--------------

1. Install Node.js from https://nodejs.org (get LTS version)

2. Create folders:
   - Make a folder called "naturalization-tracker"
   - Inside it, make a folder called "src"
   - Inside "src", make folders "components" and "utils"

3. Copy files:
   - Put all the generated files in the right folders
   - Check DIRECTORY_STRUCTURE.txt to see where each file goes

4. Open Terminal/Command Prompt:
   - Navigate to your project folder
   - Windows: cd C:\path\to\naturalization-tracker
   - Mac/Linux: cd /path/to/naturalization-tracker

5. Install:
   Type: npm install
   Press Enter and wait

6. Run:
   Type: npm run dev
   Press Enter

7. Open browser:
   Go to: http://localhost:5173

You should see the app running!


Common Issues:
--------------

"npm not found":
→ Install Node.js first

"Module not found":
→ Check file locations match directory structure

"Port already in use":
→ Change port in vite.config.js or kill other process

"IndexedDB error":
→ Use a modern browser, enable IndexedDB in settings


File Checklist:
---------------
□ package.json (root)
□ vite.config.js (root)
□ index.html (root)
□ README.md (root)
□ src/main.jsx
□ src/App.jsx
□ src/App.css
□ src/index.css
□ src/components/EligibilityDashboard.jsx
□ src/components/ProfileForm.jsx
□ src/components/TripManager.jsx
□ src/components/CivicsTest.jsx
□ src/components/LocationMap.jsx
□ src/components/DataPackExport.jsx
□ src/utils/eligibilityUtils.js
□ src/utils/storage.js
□ src/utils/civicsQuestions.js

If all checkboxes are complete, run npm install!


Need help?
----------
Read README.md for full documentation
Check INSTALLATION_CHECKLIST.txt for detailed steps
Review FILE_MANIFEST.txt for complete file listing
